channel.title: CVE Feed for wppdf.org -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wppdf.org -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-30552|2024-08-02T01:38:59.971Z -- wppdf.org -- responsive%20flipbook
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in wppdf.Org Responsive flipbook allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Responsive flipbook: from n/a through 1.0.0.
